description: Explore how The Sandbox, a significant player in the metaverse supported by blockchain technology and NFTs, aligns with Elon Musk's vision of a digital universe. Delve into Musk's potential collaboration with The Sandbox to leverage decentralized platforms and enhance the metaverse experience through technological convergence.
